source_objects.title: Creativity
source_objects.description: From idea generation to creative confidence, the power of the subconcious to innovation and invention, come discover methods of creativity.

items.title: Art & Drawing Bootcamp Challenge: Developing Daily Habits
items.headline: This art bootcamp consists of 66 daily exercises, designed to help you develop a disciplined habit of creating art daily
objectives_summary: Develop artistic skills and discipline to defeat creative blocks, procrastination, laziness and fear of failure, resulting in becoming a more productive artist.
Explore multiple drawing and illustration techniques, while learning about the important fundamentals of light and shadow.
Develop a healthy habit of drawing every day with a structured program to increase your ability to create more efficiently.

items.headline: Masterclass for those interested in learning the skills and techniques of joke writing and confident public speaking
objectives_summary: A masterclass for those interested in learning the skills and techniques of joke writing and confident public speaking

items.headline: From First Word to Final Draft
objectives_summary: Creative Writing
Horror Writing
Thriller Writing

items.title: Screenwriting 101: Learn from Working Hollywood Writers
items.headline: Over 37 Hours of In-Depth Interviews with Hollywood Screenwriting Legends. Oscar Winners, Blockbuster Filmmaking & More!
objectives_summary: Tips and Knowledge from someone Hollywood's most successful screenwriters
Screenwriting Business tips
How to Navigate Hollywood

items.title: Go Capture: The Art of Capturing Your Ideas
items.headline: Create great sketches, drafts, mockups, maquettes and thumbnails with this set of universal capturing techniques.
objectives_summary: Communicate your ideas
Focus your work
Work faster without compromising quality

items.title: Go Dream: How To Come Up With Great Ideas On Demand
items.headline: Don't rely on inspiration for a good idea! Learn how to turn bad ideas into awesome creative concepts.
objectives_summary: Never get stuck for idea
Break your own thinking patterns
Avoid clichés and bad ideas

items.title: Story Editing Masterclass

visible_instructors.job_title: Senior editor, writer, child rights advocate, social media
visible_instructors.name: Jessica
visible_instructors.title: Jessica Perini

items.headline: The ecology of novels
objectives_summary: Edit your novel, story or screenplay considering the whole work, rather than just the sum of its parts.
Consider the role of characters, including protagonists, antagonists and supporting characters.
Learn about central mysteries and how they can compel your readers forward.

items.title: How To Write Awesome Dialogue! For fiction, film, & theatre
items.headline: Take your dialogue to a new level of excitement in your manuscripts
objectives_summary: You will identify areas in your stories where dialogue can be improved, increasing your chances of landing an agent or selling well as an independent writer.
You will build stronger, more engaging plots regardless of medium or genre.
Learn from an award-winning author with nine novels out by Random House, Simon & Schuster, and more

items.headline: What is a Story? Know your story will work, and create unlimited story ideas.
objectives_summary: Identify the essential features of ANY story
Recognize a complete story idea
Identify what's missing from, and complete, a story idea

items.title: Positive Creative Thinking: Stop Doubt & Boost Self Esteem

visible_instructors.job_title: Grow your creative thinking, writing & dog business skills
visible_instructors.name: Tatiana
visible_instructors.title: Tatiana Ambrose

items.headline: Increase your self confidence in creative thinking & self-esteem in your creativity. Stop doubting your creative dreams
objectives_summary: Improve your self-esteem when it comes to you being creative
Essential foundation for beginning to creatively think like a Professional Creative Artist
Break down each negative emotion to the very basics so it doesn't hold as much power over you

items.title: Find Time to Write Poetry
items.headline: A fun and creative way to start to write poetry
objectives_summary: You'll understand how to write poetry, from beginning to end
You'll have written and polished several poems
You'll have expanded your creative horizons

items.title: Powerful Character Development with Pixar's Finding Nemo
items.headline: Move your audience whatever your story: screenwriting, screenplays, novels, children's books, plays, or creative writing
objectives_summary: Write strong, gripping characters that develop and change to move your audience
Use a simple model to improve your story
Analyse films with the model to further your learning

items.headline: How to create characters for your novel that are unique, real and necessary
objectives_summary: Create characters that are fully integrated with their stories.

items.headline: Explore and implement the five fundamental elements of storytelling into your creative process
objectives_summary: Use this course to stimulate your creative writing and problem solving skills.
By the end of this course you'll understand, and will be able to apply the 5 fundamental elements of  strong story structure, applicable to all types of literature.
